title: Ferreiros
body: A small place also called Quinta dos Ferreiros, in the parish of Calheta, where there was a chapel dedicated to Our Lady of Penha, built in 1682 by Dr. Manuel Fernandes Gomes.

Calheta: Parish on the Island of Madeira.

Dr. Manuel Fernandes Gomes: Builder of the chapel dedicated to Our Lady of Penha.

1682: Construction of the chapel dedicated to Our Lady of Penha.
